properties.displayName: _CSGP: Active Directory: CentralAuth Privileged Group Modified
properties.description:
User group costarcollection-centralauthentication-edit or costarcollection-centralauthentication-admin membership was modified 

Handling Guidance: Search Jira to see if a ticket has been created / approved for this group membership change. If there is no ticket, notify GRC and post a message in the DevOps channel in teams. Tag @DevOpsLeaders in the teams post.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Active Directory: Sensitive Group Modified - CentralAuth  {{GroupName_}}

{{Description_}}

Description: This alert identifies when a change has been made to AD groups that grant sensitive privileges in CentralAuth. These changes have compliance implications and should be documented and approved with a corresponding ticket. If there is not a ticket for this change, it needs to be escalated to GRC and DevOps.
